tool_description: Validates that dynamic analysis base shear meets minimum code requirements and applies scaling if necessary.

dynamic_base_shear.description: Base shear from dynamic analysis in kN

equivalent_static_base_shear.description: Base shear from equivalent lateral force method in kN

building_irregularity.description: True if building has structural irregularities

risk_category.description: Building risk category (I, II, III, or IV)

error_messages: Invalid base shear values: Both dynamic and static base shears must be positive.
Invalid risk category: Must be I, II, III, or IV per building code classification.
Missing base shear data: Obtain dynamic base shear from Dynamic Analysis Runner and static from Seismic Force Calculator.
usage: Input base shears from both dynamic analysis and equivalent lateral force method, along with building characteristics. Tool determines if scaling is required and calculates appropriate factors.

scale_factor.description: Required scaling factor for dynamic analysis results

scaled_base_shear.description: Final design base shear after scaling in kN

minimum_required_ratio.description: Code minimum ratio of dynamic to static base shear

scaling_required.description: True if scaling of dynamic results is required
